CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c) == 'Yes' && TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c) != 'Yes',
IF(Contains(TEXT(BUR_IKO__c), '%') && Contains(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%'), IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(BUR_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50 && VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50, 'High', IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(BUR_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50 || VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50, 'Medium', IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(BUR_IKO__c), '%', '')) < 50 && VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%', '')) < 50, 'Low', 'Unknown' ) ) ), 'Unknown' ),
IF(TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c) != 'Yes' && TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c) == 'Yes',
IF(Contains(TEXT(AVB_IKO__c), '%') && Contains(TEXT(Wall_Insulation_IKO__c), '%'), IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(AVB_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50 && VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Wall_Insulation_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50, 'High', IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(AVB_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50 || VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Wall_Insulation_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50, 'Medium', IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(AVB_IKO__c), '%', '')) < 50 && VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(Wall_Insulation_IKO__c), '%', '')) < 50, 'Low', 'Unknown' ) ) ), 'Unknown' ),
IF(TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c) == 'Yes' && TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Building_Envelope__c) == 'Yes', 'High', 'Unknown')))
CustomField.label: Product Acceptance Level
